channel.title: RiotScape problem (Emulous Base)
channel.description:
I got problem with attacking follow running... ibut follow walking is good when i run with player A and Player B
Player A attack Player B Both are run on,
when lpayer B run up Player A is walkin...
Samething with follow when i follow player both are run on... when i run ther other player is still walkin
